channel.title: bus on Technical Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in bus on Technical Ramblings

item.title: Bus journey
item.description: I am big fan of bus travel. Still it is my only mode of transportation. The two reason I love it are wind and sight seeing. Whenever the wind kisses me I forget myself and start thinking about memories. The best part of the wind (Thendral) is it kindles happiness, sad moments, memorable ones, wishes and missing. Thendral has complete effect of changing my mood and mode. I donâ€™t think only thendral has this effect.
